摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.jdon.model.query
类 PageIteratorSolver

java.lang.Object
  com.jdon.model.query.PageIteratorSolver

public class PageIteratorSolver
extends java.lang.Object

this class will supply a API that create PagfeIterator object this class is a cache proxy for JDBCTemp this class is a standard POJO, it can be called by Session Bean or directly by other pojos. default this class is not configured in container, because jdon container do not exist in EJB container. currently only exists in Web container. if you only use web, you can configure it in pojoService way in jdonframework.xml directly create the PageIteratorSolver object PageIteratorSolver pageIteratorSolver = new PageIteratorSolver(datasource); get the PageIteratorSolver object from container:

另请参见：

构造方法摘要
PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
          construtor without supplying a CacheManager, but you must put the cache.xml into the classpath, this construtor will auto find it. when you call PageIteratorSolver in Dao of a EJB, this construtor is avaliable if you use this construtor in Jdon container, this object will create another cache system that not relation with the container, this will waste memory. you must hold the PageIteratorSolver object by yourself, otherelse, the cache will disable.
PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource, CacheManager cacheManager)
          default construtor, this construtor is avaliable when you using Jdon's cache system (use jdon framework completely) but at first you must get CacheManager from the jdon container. by coding, you must get a CacheManager from the container, and create PageIteratorSolver object.
PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource, CacheManager cacheManager, BlockStrategy blockStrategy)
          we can change the block Strategy.

构造方法详细信息

PageIteratorSolver

public PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource,
                          CacheManager cacheManager)
default construtor, this construtor is avaliable when you using Jdon's cache system (use jdon framework completely) but at first you must get CacheManager from the jdon container. by coding, you must get a CacheManager from the container, and create PageIteratorSolver object. if you don't know how to get a CacheManager object, you can use next construtor;

参数：
dataSource -
pageIteratorJDBC - your type:String or Integer PageIteratorString or PageIteratorInteger

PageIteratorSolver

public PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource,
                          CacheManager cacheManager,
                          BlockStrategy blockStrategy)
we can change the block Strategy.

PageIteratorSolver

public PageIteratorSolver(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
construtor without supplying a CacheManager, but you must put the cache.xml into the classpath, this construtor will auto find it. when you call PageIteratorSolver in Dao of a EJB, this construtor is avaliable if you use this construtor in Jdon container, this object will create another cache system that not relation with the container, this will waste memory. you must hold the PageIteratorSolver object by yourself, otherelse, the cache will disable.

参数：
dataSource - DataBase datasource that can be obtained by JNDI
方法详细信息

querySingleObject

public java.lang.Object querySingleObject(java.util.Collection queryParams,
                                          java.lang.String sqlquery)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
query one object from database delgate to JdbCQueryTemp's querySingleObject method

参数：
queryParams - query sql parameter (?)
sqlquery - query sql
返回：
Object
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

getDatas

public PageIterator getDatas(java.lang.String queryParam,
                             java.lang.String sqlqueryAllCount,
                             java.lang.String sqlquery,
                             int start,
                             int count)
create a PageIterator instance

参数：
queryParam - the value of sqlquery's "?"
sqlqueryAllCount - the sql for query all count that fit for condition
sqlquery - the sql for query that fit for condtion, return id collection
start -
count -
返回：
PageIterator
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

getPageIterator

public PageIterator getPageIterator(java.lang.String sqlqueryAllCount,
                                    java.lang.String sqlquery,
                                    java.lang.String queryParam,
                                    int start,
                                    int count)
same as getDatas the parameters sort is different from the getDatas method

参数：
sqlqueryAllCount - the sql sentence for "select count(1) .."
sqlquery - the sql sentence for "select id from xxxx";
queryParam - the parameter of String type for the sqlquery.
start - the starting number of a page in allCount;
count - the display number of a page
返回：

getPageIterator

public PageIterator getPageIterator(java.lang.String sqlqueryAllCount,
                                    java.lang.String sqlquery,
                                    java.util.Collection queryParams,
                                    int startIndex,
                                    int count)
get a PageIterator

参数：
sqlqueryAllCount - the sql sentence for "select count(1) .."
sqlquery - the sql sentence for "select id from xxxx";
queryParams - the parameter collection for the sqlquery.
start - the starting number of a page in allCount;
count - the display number of a page
返回：

参数：

queryParams -
locateId -
返回：
if not locate, return null;
